# [Interview #571: TOM Signing Report - Zaela Sedai, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=571#9)

#### Question

Was the channeler at the Portal Stone the same “group” as who we saw in the Blight?

#### Brandon Sanderson

~smiles~ RAFO.
